name: Slow down: Don't touch the spikes remastered
name_original: Slow down: Don't touch the spikes remastered
description: Jump around, avoid spikes, collect coins, and repeat.  A classic in the genre game Don't touch the spikes now for PC.  But there is more. Introducing Massacre mode, where you can play with your friends. Different maps, explosions, and shields, everything you need to be the last one standing. Coming soon...
